scripts.build:css:win: powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Path src -Filter *.css | ForEach-Object { postcss $_.FullName --dir dist/src --base src }"
scripts.build:js:mac: babel src --out-dir dist/src --extensions .js && find dist/src -name '*.js' -exec terser {} --config-file terser.config.json -o {} \;
scripts.build:js:win: babel src --out-dir dist/src --extensions .js && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Path dist/src -Filter *.js | ForEach-Object { terser $_.FullName --config-file terser.config.json -o $_.FullName }"
